content:
This conversation sparked a lot of work around optimizing GroupBy operations in xarray funded by ESDS and a NASA ACCESS grant (thanks @Jean-Francois Lamarque , @Joe Hamman ). I think I have a decent solution to "time grouping" problems particularly resampling and climatology calculations.

I'm talking about it tomorrow at 10am MT on the "Pangeo Showcase" for those interested (https://columbiauniversity.zoom.us/j/94877958106?pwd=UkE0UHF1U0x3VTVUNEJTam9mTXVHZz09)

The package is called flox: https://github.com/dcherian/flox/

Deepak Cherian said:

I'm talking about it tomorrow at 10am MT on the "Pangeo Showcase" for those interested

Hi Deepak. This is exciting stuff, and is closely related to some functions in GeoCAT-comp. I'd love to attend, but I unfortunately have a time conflict then. Do you know if the talk will be recorded?
Thanks Heather, Yes it will be recorded. I also forgot to mention that it's only 15 minutes.
